Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Node>

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Node>
    Utility Class used for the A* algorithm used to find the shortest path.
